# Android and iOS Trojan Prevention

Learn to build stronger Mobile Trojan Defense in Android & iOS apps using Appdome's AI-Native mobile app defense platform — all from within your mobile CI/CD pipeline. Use Appdome to fully automate the build, testing, release, and monitoring lifecycle of Android & iOS Trojan defenses in mobile apps rapidly. Use AI-native plugins to automate the implementation of defenses against remote access trojans (RATs) like SpyNote and AndroRAT, iOS Trojans like GoldPickaxe, Android banking trojan families including BrasDex, Xenomorph, BianLian, Cabassous, Sharkbot, TeaBot, Coper, EventBot, Godfather, and others. Prevent mobile permission abuse, accessibility service abuse and malware, logging attacks, and more to prevent account takeovers (ATOs).
